label: 八省
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: The eight major government bureaus (Central Affairs, Ceremonial, Civil Affairs, Popular Affairs, Punishments, Treasury, War, Yin-Yang, Palace Affairs).  These were located in a compound that was continuous with the Great Hall of State (Daigokuden), the major ceremonial building in the palace precincts.[大極殿][RK]
